1.title: Canterlot Caged
1.plot: Twilight begins her studies at Celestia's School of Magic.

2.title: Trixie Trust
2.plot: Twilight and her friends go to the Flim Flam Brother's Circus, Pinkie meets the "Great and Powerful" Trixie. Twilight, (thanks to her book) is skeptical of Trixie, only to discover that maybe her skepticalness is rational.

3.title: The Bittersweetening
3.plot: Twilight and Pinkie join Applejack and Rarity on an adventure with Rainbow Dash and Fluttershy to explore an abandoned bakery.

4.title: Repeated Pinkie
4.plot: When the Grand-Galloping-Gala is held, Celestia makes her students plan it all. Pinkie discovers the legendary mirror pool.

5.title: Infactual History
5.plot: It's Founder's Day in Canterlot, much to Celestia's dismay. When Twilight has a hunch that Starswirl the Bearded isn't really the town's founder, she decides to investigate with Pinkie.

imdb.plot outline: In this "Gravity Falls" and "My Little Pony" Crossover-Parody, when Twilight Sparkle is accepted to Celestia's School of Magic, she is thrilled and moves to Canterlot Castle with her two best friends, Spike and Pinkie, only to discover the once-royal city is nothing but a tourist town, and the once-royal castle is a tourist trap owned and operated by the greedy Princess Celestia herself. Just when she thinks things can't get any weirder, Twilight discovers a mysterious journal and realizes that maybe Canterlot is not what it seems.
imdb.title: Canterlot Falls
plot: In this "Gravity Falls" and "My Little Pony" Crossover-Parody, when Twilight Sparkle is accepted to Celestia's School of Magic, she is thrilled and moves to Canterlot Castle with her two best friends, Spike and Pinkie, only to discover the once-royal city is nothing but a tourist town, and the once-royal castle is a tourist trap owned and operated by the greedy Princess Celestia herself. Just when she thinks things can't get any weirder, Twilight discovers a mysterious journal and realizes that maybe Canterlot is not what it seems.
